tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.20
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID1 False isArrayGRID2 False isArrayLOOKUP False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.grid_tools.20 GRID1 $GRID1 GRID2 $GRID2 LOOKUP $LOOKUP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: GRID1
param.label: Grid 1
param.help: Grid 1 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: GRID2
param.label: Grid 2
param.help: Grid 2 The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: LOOKUP
param.label: LookUp Table
param.help: LookUp Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
